metadata.synopsis: Gale is interested in items woven with especially powerful magic. In these lines, you come across one such item. This one is a Sword of Tyr.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: This sword has all kinds of power running through it. Gale, want a look?

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: A fine blade. Almost a pity to absorb it's magic, but I do so have need of it.
